text: A de excommunicato deliberando is a writ which issued out of chancery to release a prisoner from the county jail after the bishop had certified the prisoner's reconciliation with the Church, following his arrest and imprisonment under a writ de excommunicato capiendo."De Excommunicato Deliberando" Legal Dictionaries of the Encyclopedia of Law Project"De Excommunicato Deliberando" Law & Legal Definition, U.S. Legal"De Excommunicato Deliberando" The Law Dictionary, Featuring Black's Law Dictionary Free Online Legal Dictionary 2nd Ed. ==See also== *De Excommunicato Capiendo ==References== Category:Ecclesiastical writs Category:Latin legal terminology
title: De Excommunicato Deliberando
